TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataAdapter

summary.span: 允许对象实现 DataAdapter，并且表示一组用于填充和更新 及数据源的方法以及与映射操作有关的属性。

span.span: Allows an object to implement a DataAdapter, and represents a set of methods and mapping action-related properties that are used to fill and update a and update a data source.

summary.span: 实例针对作为（或类似于）具有文字命令（如 Transact-SQL）的关系数据库的数据源，而 实例可使用任何类型的数据源。

span.span: instances are for data sources that are (or resemble) relational databases with textual commands (like Transact-SQL), while instances could can use any type of data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口允许继承类实现 DataAdapter 类, 该类表示数据源与之间的桥梁。 The interface allows an inheriting class to implement a DataAdapter class, which represents the bridge between a data source and a . 有关 DataAdapter 类的详细信息, 请参阅[从 DataAdapter 填充数据集](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md)。For more information about DataAdapter classes, see [Populating a DataSet from a DataAdapter](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/populating-a-dataset-from-a-dataadapter.md). 应用程序不会直接创建接口的实例, 而是实现继承的类的实例。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but implements an instance of a class that inherits . 继承的类必须实现继承成员, 并且通常定义其他成员来添加特定于提供程序的功能。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and they typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如, 接口定义了一个采用作为参数的方法。For example, the interface defines a method that takes a as a parameter. 反过来, 该类继承方法, 还定义方法的两个附加重载, 该重载采用 ADO 记录集对象作为参数。In turn, the class inherits the method and also defines two additional overloads of the method that take an ADO Recordset object as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生类 ( 、 和) 从数据库中选择记录。The following example uses the derived classes, , , and , to select records from a database. 然后返回填充的。The filled is then returned. 为此, 向方法传递了一个初始化的、一个连接字符串和一个作为 transact-sql SELECT 语句的查询字符串。To do this, the method is passed an initialized , a connection string, and a query string that is a Transact-SQL SELECT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataAdapter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 若要提升 .NET Framework 数据提供程序之间的一致性, 请将该继承类命名为 DataAdapter, 其中是为特定 .NET Framework 数据提供程序命名空间中的所有类指定的统一前缀。

span.span: To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form DataAdapter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace.

para.span: 例如, 是命名空间中类的前缀。

span.span: For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace.

para.span: 从接口继承时, 应实现以下构造函数:

span.span: When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors:
Item
Description
PrvDataAdapter()

description.span: 初始化 PrvDataAdapter 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class.
PrvDataAdapter(PrvCommand selectCommand)

description.span: 使用指定的 SQL SELECT 语句初始化 PrvDataAdapter 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class by using the specified SQL SELECT statement.
PrvDataAdapter(string selectCommandText, string selectConnectionString)

description.span: 使用 SQL SELECT 语句和连接字符串初始化 PrvDataAdapter 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class by using an SQL SELECT statement and a connection string.
PrvDataAdapter(string selectCommandText, PrvConnection selectConnection)

description.span: 使用 SQL SELECT 语句和 PrvConnection 对象初始化 PrvDataAdapter 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the PrvDataAdapter class by using an SQL SELECT statement and a PrvConnection object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Fill(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要用记录和架构（如果必要）填充的 。

span.span: A to fill with records and, if necessary, schema.

summary.span: 添加或更新 中的行以匹配使用 名称的数据源中的行，并创建一个名为“Table”的 。

span.span: Adds or updates rows in the to match those in the data source using the name, and creates a named "Table".

returns.span: 已在 中成功添加或刷新的行数。

span.span: The number of rows successfully added to or refreshed in the .

returns.span: 这不包括受不返回行的语句影响的行。

span.span: This does not include rows affected by statements that do not return rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用由关联的属性指定的 SELECT 语句从数据源中检索行。 retrieves rows from the data source using the SELECT statement specified by an associated property. 与 SELECT 语句关联的连接对象必须有效, 但不需要打开。The connection object associated with the SELECT statement must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果在调用之前连接关闭, 则将其打开以检索数据, 然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果在调用之前连接处于打开状态, 则该连接将保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 然后, 操作将行添加到中的目标对象, 并创建对象 (如果它们尚不存在)。 The operation then adds the rows to destination objects in the , creating the objects if they do not already exist. 创建对象时, 该操作通常仅创建列名元数据。When creating objects, the operation usually creates only column name metadata. 但是, 如果将属性设置为`AddWithKey`, 则还会创建相应的主键和约束。However, if the property is set to `AddWithKey`, appropriate primary keys and constraints are also created. 如果 `SelectCommand` 返回 OUTER JOIN 的结果，则 `DataAdapter` 不会为生成的 设置 值。If the `SelectCommand` returns the results of an OUTER JOIN, the `DataAdapter` does not set a value for the resulting . 必须显式定义主键, 以确保正确解析重复行。You must explicitly define the primary key to ensure that duplicate rows are resolved correctly. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[定义主键](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md)。For more information, see [Defining Primary Keys](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/defining-primary-keys.md). 如果在 填充时遇到重复的列, 它将使用模式 "columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3" 等, 为后续列生成名称。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入数据包含未命名列, 则这些列将按照模式 "Column1"、"Column2", 依此类推。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 如果将多个结果集添加到中, 则每个结果集将放在一个单独的表中。When multiple result sets are added to the , each result set is put in a separate table. 附加的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名来命名 (例如, "表"、"Table1"、"Table2" 等)。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称时, 应用程序应小心, 以确保不会与这些命名模式发生冲突。Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur. 当用于填充的 SELECT 语句返回多个结果 (如批处理 SQL 语句) 时, 如果其中一个结果包含错误, 则会跳过所有后续结果, 并且不会将其添加到中。When the SELECT statement that is used to populate the returns multiple results, such as a batch SQL statement, if one of the results contains an error, all successive results are skipped and not added to the . 您可以在同一 上多次使用该方法。You can use the method multiple times on the same . 如果存在主键, 则传入行与已存在的匹配行合并在一起。If a primary key exists, incoming rows are merged with matching rows that already exist. 如果主键不存在, 则传入行将追加到。If no primary key exists, incoming rows are appended to the . > [!NOTE] > 当处理返回多个结果的批处理 SQL 语句时, .NET Framework 数据提供程序的和的实现仅检索第一个结果的架构信息。When handling batch SQL statements that return multiple results, the implementation of and for a .NET Framework data provider retrieves schema information for only the first result.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema (System.Data.DataSet dataSet, System.Data.SchemaType schemaType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable[] FillSchema(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet, valuetype System.Data.SchemaType schemaType) cil managed
public: cli::array <System::Data::DataTable ^> ^ FillSchema(System::Data::DataSet ^ dataSet, System::Data::SchemaType schemaType);
abstract member FillSchema : System.Data.DataSet * System.Data.SchemaType -> System.Data.DataTable[]

param.name: dataSet
param.span: 要用数据源中的架构填充的 。

span.span: The to be filled with the schema from the data source.
One of the values.

summary.span: 将名为“Table”的 添加到指定的 ，并根据指定的 配置架构以匹配数据源中的架构。

span.span: Adds a named "Table" to the specified and configures the schema to match that in the data source based on the specified .

returns.span: 对象的数组，这些对象包含从数据源返回的架构信息。

span.span: An array of objects that contain schema information returned from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用检索数据源中的架构。 The method retrieves the schema from the data source using the . 与关联的连接对象必须有效, 但不需要打开。The connection object associated with the must be valid, but it does not need to be open. 如果在调用之前连接关闭, 则将其打开以检索数据, 然后关闭。If the connection is closed before is called, it is opened to retrieve data, then closed. 如果在调用之前连接处于打开状态, 则该连接将保持打开状态。If the connection is open before is called, it remains open. 操作将添加到目标。 A operation adds a to the destination . 然后, 它将列添加到的 , 并配置以下属性 (如果它们存在于数据源中):It then adds columns to the of the and configures the following properties if they exist at the data source: - - 。. 您必须分别设置和。You must set and separately. - - - 根据以下规则 , 还可以配置和属性: also configures the and properties according to the following rules: - 如果返回一个或多个主键列, 则将它们用作的主键列。If one or more primary key columns are returned by the , they are used as the primary key columns for the . - 如果未返回主键列但唯一列为, 则在所有唯一列都不可为 null 的情况下, 将唯一列用作主键。If no primary key columns are returned but unique columns are, the unique columns are used as the primary key if all the unique columns are non-nullable. 如果任何列可为 null, 则会将添加到, 但不设置属性。If any of the columns are nullable, a is added to the , but the property is not set. - 如果为主键列和唯一列都返回, 则主键列将用作的主键列。If both primary key columns and unique columns are returned, the primary key columns are used as the primary key columns for the . 请注意, 根据前面的规则将主键和 unique 约束添加到, 但不会添加其他约束类型。Note that primary keys and unique constraints are added to the according to the previous rules, but other constraint types are not added. 如果在 SQL Server 表中的一列或多列上定义了唯一聚集索引, 并且在一组单独的列上定义了 primary key 约束, 则将返回聚集索引中的列的名称。If a unique clustered index is defined on a column or columns in a SQL Server table and the primary key constraint is defined on a separate set of columns, then the names of the columns in the clustered index will be returned. 若要返回主键列的名称, 请使用带有指定主键索引名称的 SELECT 语句的查询提示。To return the name or names of the primary key columns, use a query hint with the SELECT statement that specifies the name of the primary key index. 有关如何指定查询提示的详细信息, 请参阅[查询提示 (transact-sql)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx)。For more information about how to specify query hints, see [Query Hint (Transact-SQL)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms181714.aspx). 如果在 填充时遇到重复的列, 它将使用模式 "columnname1"、"columnname2"、"columnname3" 等, 为后续列生成名称。If the encounters duplicate columns while populating a , it generates names for the successive columns, using the pattern "columnname1", "columnname2", "columnname3", and so on. 如果传入数据包含未命名列, 则这些列将按照模式 "Column1"、"Column2", 依此类推。If the incoming data contains unnamed columns, they are put in the according to the pattern "Column1", "Column2", and so on. 如果将多个结果集添加到中, 则每个结果集将放在一个单独的表中。When multiple result sets are added to the , each result set is put in a separate table. 附加的结果集通过将整数值追加到指定的表名来命名 (例如, "表"、"Table1"、"Table2" 等)。Additional result sets are named by appending integral values to the specified table name (for example, "Table", "Table1", "Table2", and so on). 使用列和表名称时, 应用程序应小心, 以确保不会与这些命名模式发生冲突。Applications should use caution when using column and table names to ensure that conflicts with these naming patterns do not occur. 不返回任何行。 returns no rows. 使用方法可将行添加到。 Use the method to add rows to a .

The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TableMappings As ITableMappingCollection
public: property System::Data::ITableMappingCollection ^ TableMappings { System::Data::ITableMappingCollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 指示如何将源表映射到数据集表。

span.span: Indicates how a source table is mapped to a dataset table.

value.span: 一个集合，它提供返回记录和 之间的主映射。

span.span: A collection that provides the master mapping between the returned records and the .
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅使用名为 "table" 的源表的映射。The uses only the mappings for the source table named "Table". 返回数据的所有 SELECT、INSERT、DELETE 和 UPDATE 语句都必须使用一致的列命名。All SELECT, INSERT, DELETE, and UPDATE statements returning data must do so using consistent column naming. 记录中返回的列名必须是唯一的, 否则具有重复名称的列将覆盖以前的数据。The column names returned in the records must be unique, otherwise columns with duplicate names overwrite previous data. 在中, 只有映射到名为 "table" 的源表的表才会对其更改进行协调。On , only the table mapped to the source table named "Table" will have its changes reconciled.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 Update(class System.Data.DataSet dataSet) cil managed

span.span: The used to update the data source.

summary.span: 从名为“Table”的 为指定的 中每个已插入、已更新或已删除的行调用相应的 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句。

span.span: Calls the respective INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements for each inserted, updated, or deleted row in the specified from a named "Table".
The number of rows successfully updated from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当应用程序调用方法时, 将检查属性, 并根据在中配置的索引的顺序,对每一行执行所需的INSERT、UPDATE或DELETE语句。When an application calls the method, the examines the property, and executes the required INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements iteratively for each row, based on the order of the indexes configured in the . 例如, 可能执行 DELETE 语句, 后跟 INSERT 语句, 然后执行另一 delete 语句, 因为中的行的顺序。For example, might execute a DELETE statement, followed by an INSERT statement, and then another DELETE statement, because of the ordering of the rows in the . 请注意, 这些语句不作为批处理执行;每一行都单独更新。Be aware that these statements are not performed as a batch process; each row is updated individually. 如果必须控制语句类型的顺序 (例如, 在更新之前插入), 则应用程序可以调用方法。An application can call the method if you must control the sequence of statement types (for example, INSERTs before UPDATEs). 有关详细信息, 请参阅[用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information, see [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). 如果尚未指定 INSERT、UPDATE 或 DELETE 语句, 则该方法将生成一个异常。If INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements have not been specified, the method generates an exception. 但是, 如果您设置了 .NET Framework 数据提供程序的`SelectCommand`属性, 则可以创建或对象以自动为单表更新生成 SQL 语句。However, you can create a or object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the `SelectCommand` property of a .NET Framework data provider. 然后, CommandBuilder 将生成未设置的任何其他 SQL 语句。Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the CommandBuilder. 此代逻辑要求密钥列信息存在于中。This generation logic requires key column information to be present in the . 有关详细信息, 请参阅[通过 Commandbuilder 生成命令](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md)。For more information see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generating-commands-with-commandbuilders.md). 在执行更新之前, 方法将从第一个映射中列出的表中检索行。The method retrieves rows from the table listed in the first mapping before performing an update. 然后 , 使用属性的值更新该行。The then updates the row using the value of the property. 将忽略返回的任何其他行。Any additional rows returned are ignored. 在将任何数据加载回后, 将引发事件, 从而允许用户检查已协调的行和该命令返回的任何输出参数。After any data is loaded back into the , the event is raised, allowing the user to inspect the reconciled row and any output parameters returned by the command. 成功更新行后, 将接受对该行所做的更改。After a row updates successfully, the changes to that row are accepted. 使用时, 执行顺序如下所示:When using , the order of execution is as follows: 1. 中的值将被移动到参数值中。The values in the are moved to the parameter values. 2. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 3. 命令执行。The command executes. 4. 如果将命令设置为`FirstReturnedRecord`, 则会将返回的第一个结果放入中。If the command is set to `FirstReturnedRecord`, then the first returned result is put in the . 5. 如果有输出参数, 则将它们放在中。If there are output parameters, they are put in the . 6. 引发 事件。The event is raised. 7. 调用 。 is called. 与关联的每个命令通常都具有与之关联的参数集合。Each command associated with the usually has a parameter collection associated with it. 通过`SourceColumn` .NET Framework 数据提供程序的`Parameter`类的和属性`SourceVersion` , 将参数映射到当前行。Parameters are mapped to the current row through the `SourceColumn` and `SourceVersion` properties of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class. `SourceColumn`引用用于获取当前行的参数值的列。`SourceColumn` refers to a column that the references to obtain parameter values for the current row. `SourceColumn`在应用了任何表映射之前引用未映射的列名称。`SourceColumn` refers to the unmapped column name before any table mappings have been applied. 如果`SourceColumn`引用不存在的列, 则执行的操作取决于下列值之一。If `SourceColumn` refers to a nonexistent column, the action taken depends on one of the following values. |枚举值Enumeration Value|执行的操作Action Taken| |-----------------------|------------------| |`MissingMappingAction.Passthrough`|如果不存在映射, 请使用中的源列名称和表名称。Use the source column names and table names in the if no mapping is present.| |`MissingMappingAction.Ignore`|生成。A is generated. 当显式设置映射时, 缺少输入参数的映射通常是由错误引起的。When the mappings are explicitly set, a missing mapping for an input parameter is usually caused by an error.| |`MissingMappingAction.Error`|生成。A is generated.| 属性还可用于将输出或输入/输出参数的值映射回`DataSet`。 `SourceColumn`The `SourceColumn` property is also used to map the value for output or input/output parameters back to the `DataSet`. 如果引用不存在的列, 则会生成异常。An exception is generated if it refers to a nonexistent column. `Proposed` `Original` `Current`.NET Framework 数据提供程序的`Parameter`类的属性确定是使用列值的、还是版本。`SourceVersion`The `SourceVersion` property of a .NET Framework data provider's `Parameter` class determines whether to use the `Original`, `Current`, or `Proposed` version of the column value. 此功能经常用于在 UPDATE 语句的 WHERE 子句中包含原始值, 以检查是否存在开放式并发冲突。This capability is frequently used to include original values in the WHERE clause of an UPDATE statement to check for optimistic concurrency violations. > [!NOTE] > 如果在更新行时出现错误, 则会引发异常并中止执行更新。If an error occurs while updating a row, an exception is thrown and execution of the update is discontinued. 若要在遇到错误时继续执行更新操作而不生成异常, 请在调用`true` 之前将属性设置为。To continue the update operation without generating exceptions when an error is encountered, set the property to `true` before calling . 您还可以在 DataAdapter `RowUpdated`事件内每行响应错误。You may also respond to errors on a per-row basis within the `RowUpdated` event of a DataAdapter. 若要继续执行更新`RowUpdated`操作而不在事件中生成异常, 请将的属性设置为。To continue the update operation without generating an exception within the `RowUpdated` event, set the property of the to . ## Examples 下面的示例使用派生类向数据源。The following example uses the derived class, , to the data source. 此示例假设您已创建 和。This example assumes that you have created an and a .
